pages.text: After receiving a $(item)star piece$() by collecting a $(l:shooting_stars/intro_stars)shooting star$() in time, it has multiple uses. You can make $(item)star dust$() and $(item)star stones$() out of it.$(br2)Another use for star pieces is, the possibility to $(thing)infuse$() them. Simply hold the left mouse button for some seconds. This will cost you $(thing)3 XP levels$(), to be mindful.
